personalInformation.headline: A passionate front-end developer, dedicated to creating engaging and user-friendly digital experiences with creativity and expertise using cutting-edge technologies.
personalInformation.About_headline: A dedicated Front-end Developer based in
personalInformation.About_me_p_1: I am Software Engineering graduate, with a keen eye for detail and a love for crafting beautifull and user-friendly websites . With 2 years of experience in the industry, I have honed my skills in HTML, CSS, Javascript, React JS and React Native.
personalInformation.About_me_p_2: I take pride in my ability to translate design concepts into functional and visually appealing websites that not only meet but exceed client expectations. I strive to ensure that every aspect of the user interface is optimized for performance, accessibility, and user experience.
personalInformation.About_me_p_3: Additionally, I am also a content writer, allowing me to create engaging and compelling written content to complement my web development skills.

projects.title: React Portfolio Website
projects.description: A portfolio website built using React.js.
